main event: A family driving near Ogden, Utah spotted a strange aerial object that maneuvered around their car before shooting straight up into the sky at a tremendous rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was described as saucer shaped and bright silver in color., The family reported the sighting to the Ogden Air Force Base and the Civil Aeronautics Administration., The sighting occurred on 10 April 1957., Police officers also witnessed a glowing, pulsating object on 21 April 1957., Observers reported physical effects such as static on their radio and dimming of headlights during the sighting.
witness description: family in a car and police officers
